page.title: 19LA MARE AU SEIGNEUR
page.content:
If you like fresh water fishing then one of the best places to go to is La Mare au Seigneur. The locals call it St Ouen's Pond. It is the largest natural inland fresh water area in the Island. You can catch Perch, Bream, Eel and Trout and permits to fish are quite easy to obtain and are not very expensive.
Whilst you wait for that big bite there is plenty of other wild life to look at. Birds and other marsh dwellers busy themselves whilst the tourists and locals alike pass within one hundred metres on the busiest road in St Ouen's Bay.
It is only on rare occasions that it is not physically possible to fish. Then you have to be content with ice skating!
